si.t: HOW TO USE THE VIRAL DIGITAL PRODUCT BUILDER:
STEP 1:
MAKE YOUR OWN COPY:
In order to edit this google sheet, please click "file" and then "make a copy" so that you have your own version.
STEP 2:
FIND YOUR NICHE:

r.t: , look over the 50 niches we have included and choose one to build your product. (This works best if you are passionate/knowledgeable about a certain niche)

si.t: STEP 3:
CHOOSE GENERAL PRODUCT IDEA:
Under the General Product Idea column (purple header), choose one product idea you would like to build within your selected niche.
STEP 4:
SELECT A SPECIFIC PROBLEM SOLVED:
Under the Specific Problem Solved column (teal header), choose one problem your product will focus on.
STEP 5:
PICK A POTENTIAL PRODUCT NAME:
Under the Potential Name Options column (orange header), select one name that clearly communicates the problem and outcome.
STEP 6:
CHOOSE YOUR DIGITAL PRODUCT FORMAT:
Under the Digital Product Format column (pink header), choose one format for your product.
STEP 7:
ADD ACCOMPANYING HANDOUTS & RESOURCES:
Under the Accompanying Product Handouts/Resources column (green header), select 1–3 supporting resources to increase the value of your product.
TABLE OF CONTENTS: (Find your niche)
Click on any niche below and it will take you to that tab where your niche is located.
